column1: Acknowledgments: ASTU is sincerely acknowledged for the staff time granted for this research.
Most of the materials and information used for this review were collected from the Ministry of
Water, Irrigation and Energy (MoWIE) during my service at the Ministry as member of the Irrigation
and Drainage Advisory Group. The Ministry is duly acknowledged for providing access to the
information. Special thanks to my hosting institution, Adama Science and Technology University,
for granting me leave during my engagement at MoWIE.
Conﬂicts of Interest: The author declares no conﬂict of interest.
